panels.content:
# Content Activity
User activity on guides, wikis, and categories.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT -- date(FROM_UNIXTIME(user_history.date)) AS date_group,
       count(*)
FROM user_history


-- SELECT guideid as "Guide ID", percent as "Percentage"
-- from guide_authors 
where 
user_history.event = 'new_guide'

and year(FROM_UNIXTIME(user_history.date)) = year(CURRENT_TIME)
and month(FROM_UNIXTIME(user_history.date)) = month(CURRENT_TIME)

SELECT sum(std.value) AS 'Views'

from stats_per_day std				     
where 
std.key <= DAY(CURRENT_TIME)
and 
std.type ='guide'
ORDER BY `Views` DESC
;

SELECT sum(std.value) AS 'Views'

from stats_per_day std				     
where 
std.key <= DAY(CURRENT_TIME)
and 
std.type ='TOPIC'
ORDER BY `Views` DESC
;

SELECT sum(std.value) AS 'Views'

from stats_per_day std				     
where 
std.key <= DAY(CURRENT_TIME)
and 
std.type ='wiki'
ORDER BY `Views` DESC
;

SELECT user_history.date as time, 

 
concat(monthname(FROM_UNIXTIME(user_history.date))," ",year(FROM_UNIXTIME(user_history.date))) as metric,
       count(historyid) as value
FROM user_history


-- SELECT guideid as "Guide ID", percent as "Percentage"
-- from guide_authors 
where 
user_history.event = 'new_guide'

and

CASE
WHEN $USERID != 'All Users'
THEN user_history.userid = $USERID
else 1=1
end

and

FROM_UNIXTIME(user_history.date) >= $__timeFrom()


and 

FROM_UNIXTIME(user_history.date) <= $__timeTo()

GROUP BY 

year(FROM_UNIXTIME(user_history.date)), month(FROM_UNIXTIME(user_history.date))



-- order by 

-- year(FROM_UNIXTIME(user_history.date)) asc, month(FROM_UNIXTIME(user_history.date))
;

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(user_history.date), "%M-%Y") AS date_group, global_users.username, 
       count(historyid) as "New Guides"
FROM user_history
left join global_users on global_users.userid = user_history.userid

-- SELECT guideid as "Guide ID", percent as "Percentage"
-- from guide_authors 
where 
user_history.event = 'new_guide'
-- and
-- userid= {USERID}
and

CASE
WHEN $USERID != 'All Users'
THEN user_history.userid = $USERID
else 1=1
end

and


date(FROM_UNIXTIME(user_history.date)) >= $__timeFrom()


and 


date(FROM_UNIXTIME(user_history.date)) <= $__timeTo()


GROUP BY user_history.userid, DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(user_history.date), "%M-%Y")

order by year(FROM_UNIXTIME(user_history.date)) desc, month(FROM_UNIXTIME(user_history.date)) desc, day(date_group) desc, user_history.userid;

SELECT gr.date as time_sec, 

-- "Edits" as metric,
concat(monthname(FROM_UNIXTIME(gr.date))," ", year(FROM_UNIXTIME(gr.date))) as metric,

       count(gr.guide_revisionid) as value
FROM guide_revisions gr

-- left JOIN guide_current gc on (gc.guide_revisionid=gr.guide_revisionid)
-- left JOIN guide_meta gm ON (gr.gtr_revisionid = gm.revisionid) and (gc.guide_revisionid=gr.guide_revisionid)
-- left JOIN guide_text gt ON (gt.gt_revisionid = gr.gt_revisionid) and (gc.guide_revisionid=gr.guide_revisionid)



-- SELECT guideid as "Guide ID", percent as "Percentage"
-- from guide_authors 
where 


CASE
WHEN $GUIDE_ID != 'All Guides'
THEN gr.guideid = $GUIDE_ID
else 1=1
end

and

FROM_UNIXTIME(gr.date) >= $__timeFrom()

and 

FROM_UNIXTIME(gr.date) <= $__timeTo()

GROUP BY 


year(FROM_UNIXTIME(gr.date)), month(FROM_UNIXTIME(gr.date))

;

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(gr.date), "%M-%Y") AS date_group, 

CASE
WHEN a.guide_revisionid != ''
THEN a.title
else "Deleted Guide"
end
as title
, 

gr.guideid as "Guide ID",
       count(gr.guide_revisionid) as Edits



FROM guide_revisions gr

 
-- left JOIN guide_meta gm ON (gr.gtr_revisionid = gm.revisionid) and (gc.guide_revisionid=gr.guide_revisionid)

left join 
(select guide_text.title, 
 -- guide_text.gt_revisionid, 
guide_current.guide_revisionid, 
 guide_revisions.guideid  
 
 from guide_current
 
left join guide_revisions on guide_current.guide_revisionid= guide_revisions.guide_revisionid
 
left join guide_text on guide_text.gt_revisionid = guide_revisions.gt_revisionid) 
 
 a on a.guideid = gr.guideid
		   
		   
		   
left JOIN guide_text gt ON (gt.gt_revisionid = gr.gt_revisionid)

-- left JOIN global_users on gm.userid = global_users.userid


where 

CASE
WHEN $GUIDE_ID != 'All Guides'
THEN gr.guideid = $GUIDE_ID
else 1=1
end


and 


date(FROM_UNIXTIME(gr.date)) >= $__timeFrom()

and 


date(FROM_UNIXTIME(gr.date)) <= $__timeTo()






GROUP BY gr.guideid,

date_group

order by year(FROM_UNIXTIME(gr.date)) desc, month(FROM_UNIXTIME(gr.date)) desc




;

SELECT timestamp(concat(stm.year,"-",stm.key,"-","2"), "00:00:00") as time, 
-- stm.year, stm.key, 
sum(stm.value) AS value, "Guide Views" as metric

FROM stats_per_month stm
WHERE
metric = 'hits'
AND type = 'guide'

AND id IN (
   SELECT gc.guideid
   FROM guide_current gc
   JOIN guide_revisions gr USING (guide_revisionid)
   JOIN guide_meta gm ON (gr.gtr_revisionid = gm.revisionid)
)

and

stm.year >= year($__timeFrom())

and 

stm.year <= year($__timeTo())

-- and

-- CASE 
-- WHEN stm.year = year($__timeTo()) 
-- THEN stm.key <= month($__timeTo())
-- else 1=1
-- end

-- and 

-- CASE 
-- WHEN stm.year = year($__timeFrom())
-- THEN stm.key >= month($__timeFrom())
-- else 1=1
-- end



GROUP BY stm.year, stm.key

SELECT timestamp(concat(stm.year,"-",stm.key,"-","2"), "00:00:00") as time, 
-- stm.year, stm.key, 
sum(stm.value) AS value, "Category Views" as metric

FROM stats_per_month stm
WHERE
metric = 'hits'
AND type = 'TOPIC'
AND id IN (
   SELECT gc.guideid
   FROM guide_current gc
   JOIN guide_revisions gr USING (guide_revisionid)
   JOIN guide_meta gm ON (gr.gtr_revisionid = gm.revisionid)
)

and

stm.year >= year($__timeFrom())

and 

stm.year <= year($__timeTo())

and

CASE 
WHEN stm.year = year($__timeTo()) 
THEN stm.key <= month($__timeTo())
else 1=1
end

and 

CASE 
WHEN stm.year = year($__timeFrom())
THEN stm.key >= month($__timeFrom())
else 1=1
end


GROUP BY stm.year, stm.key

SELECT timestamp(concat(stm.year,"-",stm.key,"-","2"), "00:00:00") as time, 
-- stm.year, stm.key, 
sum(stm.value) AS value, "WIKI Views" as metric

FROM stats_per_month stm
WHERE
metric = 'hits'
AND type = 'WIKI'
AND id IN (
   SELECT gc.guideid
   FROM guide_current gc
   JOIN guide_revisions gr USING (guide_revisionid)
   JOIN guide_meta gm ON (gr.gtr_revisionid = gm.revisionid)
)

and

stm.year >= year($__timeFrom())

and 

stm.year <= year($__timeTo())


and
CASE 
WHEN stm.year = year($__timeTo()) 
THEN stm.key <= month($__timeTo())
else 1=1
end

and 

CASE 
WHEN stm.year = year($__timeFrom())
THEN stm.key >= month($__timeFrom())
else 1=1
end

GROUP BY stm.year, stm.key

SELECT
 a.title, a.guideid, concat(MONTHNAME(STR_TO_DATE(stm.key, '%m'))," , ",stm.year) as "Month",

	   stm.value AS 'Views'
FROM
(SELECT gc.guideid, 
 		from_unixtime(gm.published_date,'%Y-%m-%d') AS 'published_date',
	   gm.device,
 	   group_concat(distinct(if(gt.langid='en',gt.thing,NULL))) AS 'thing',
	   group_concat(distinct(if(gt.langid='en',gt.title,NULL))) AS 'title'
FROM guide_current gc
JOIN guide_revisions gr on gr.guide_revisionid = gc.guide_revisionid
JOIN guide_meta gm ON (gr.gtr_revisionid = gm.revisionid)
JOIN guide_text gt ON (gt.gt_revisionid = gr.gt_revisionid)

GROUP BY gc.guideid
ORDER BY gc.guideid desc) a

JOIN stats_per_month stm ON (stm.id = a.guideid AND 
						     stm.metric='hits' AND stm.type='guide')
						     
where 


CASE
WHEN $GUIDE_ID != 'All Guides'
THEN a.guideid = $GUIDE_ID
else 1=1
end


and 
stm.year >= year($__timeFrom())

and 

stm.year <= year($__timeTo())

and 

CASE 
WHEN stm.year = year($__timeTo()) 
THEN stm.key <= month($__timeTo())
else 1=1
end

and 

CASE 
WHEN stm.year = year($__timeFrom())
THEN stm.key >= month($__timeFrom())
else 1=1
end






and

-- stm.key <= MONTH(CURRENT_TIME)
-- and stm.year = Year(CURRENT_TIME)
-- and 
stm.key <> 0
and stm.value <> 0
GROUP BY a.guideid, concat(MONTHNAME(STR_TO_DATE(stm.key, '%m'))," , ",stm.year) 
ORDER BY stm.year desc, stm.key desc, a.guideid
;

SELECT
w.title, concat(MONTHNAME(STR_TO_DATE(stm.key, '%m'))," , ",stm.year) as "Month",

	   stm.value AS 'Views'
FROM wikis w
JOIN stats_per_month stm ON (stm.id = w.wikiid AND 
						     stm.metric='hits' AND stm.type='topic')
						     
where 
stm.key <> 0
and stm.value <> 0



and 
stm.year >= year($__timeFrom())

and 

stm.year <= year($__timeTo())

and 



CASE 
	WHEN concat($CATEGORYID) = 'All Categories'
	THEN 1 = 1 
	ELSE w.title=$CATEGORYID
END

and

CASE 
WHEN stm.year = year($__timeTo()) 
THEN stm.key <= month($__timeTo())
else 1=1
end

and 

CASE 
WHEN stm.year = year($__timeFrom())
THEN stm.key >= month($__timeFrom())
else 1=1
end


GROUP BY w.wikiid, concat(MONTHNAME(STR_TO_DATE(stm.key, '%m'))," , ",stm.year) 
ORDER BY stm.year desc, stm.key desc, w.wikiid
;

list.label: User
list.name: USERID
list.query: select  CONCAT(global_users.username, " — ", "User ID:", global_users.userid) AS __text, global_users.userid AS __value from global_users

list.definition: select guide_text.guideid AS __value,  CONCAT(guide_text.title, " — ", "Guide ID:", guide_text.guideid) AS __text   from (select max(gt_revisionid) as gt_revisionid, guideid from guide_text group by guideid) x  left join guide_text on guide_text.gt_revisionid=x.gt_revisionid
list.label: Guide
list.name: GUIDE_ID
list.query: select guide_text.guideid AS __value,  CONCAT(guide_text.title, " — ", "Guide ID:", guide_text.guideid) AS __text   from (select max(gt_revisionid) as gt_revisionid, guideid from guide_text group by guideid) x  left join guide_text on guide_text.gt_revisionid=x.gt_revisionid

list.label: Category
list.name: CATEGORYID
list.query: select  "All Categories", list.title as "Category" from (select distinct title from wikis where wikis.namespace="TOPIC") list order by 'All Categories', title ASC
